availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Peter H. Messmore (Hancock County, Kentucky, farmer.)

body.p: Hancock County, Kentucky, farmer. Tennessee native. Married to Sarah Ann Shrader Messmore in Jefferson County, Kentucky, on October 8, 1851. Father of J.B. Messmore, Eisom Messmore, Emily Messmore, Susan Messmore, and Mary Messmore. Farmer in Hancock County, Kentucky, in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hancock County, p. 951.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hancock County, Hawesville, p. 182B.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Jefferson County Marriages, Film #000819593.
